Ingredients.3: 1 salt and ground black pepper to taste

Ingredients.6: 1 (15 ounce) can dark red kidney beans, drained

Ingredients.7: 0.5 (12 ounce) bag nacho cheese-flavored corn chips (such as Doritos®), crushed

Ingredients.10: 0.5 cup shredded Cheddar cheese, or more to taste

Ingredients.11: 0.5 cup Catalina salad dressing, or to taste

Directions.1: Heat a large nonstick skillet over medium to medium-high heat and saute ground beef, diced onion, salt, and pepper together until ground beef is browned and no longer pink and onions are tender, about 10 minutes. Add 1/4 cup water and taco seasoning to the meat. Stir to coat and allow to simmer for 1 minute to thicken. Set aside to cool while you prep the salad.

Directions.2: Add kidney beans, crushed chips, lettuce, tomatoes, Cheddar cheese, and dressing to a large bowl. Top with meat mixture and toss gently to evenly combine. Serve immediately.
